description: Once again Claire Adams unleashes her inimitable style here at WB. This time her willing victim is the beautiful Vendetta. Claire knows how to get the most out of her submissives and Vendetta quickly learns that she needs to use her brain as well as her terrific body to keep Claire happy. The two seem to develope a unique chemistry throughout the shoot that is exciting, sexy and hot to watch. Thanks you two!
title: Vendetta
